newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's Rato says Buba move good for Spain.
newsitem.headline: Spain's Rato says Buba move good for Spain.

text.p: The Bundesbank's decision to cut its repo rate yesterday improved the economic outlook for Spain, Economy Minister Rodrigo Rato said.
"It's extraordinarily positive news for the Spanish economy," he said.
Asked about the Bank of Spain's decision to leave its key rate unchanged at 7.25 percent at this morning's repo tender he said it was an autonomous decision for the bank to take.
"The government can only say: we are going to fight against inflation and we are going to fight against the deficit," he told a news conference after Friday's cabinet meeting.
